common.no_clans_found:
Няма намерени кланове на този сървър за посочения вход!
Използвайте команда {{command}}, за да свържете клан.
common.no_clans_linked:
Няма кланове, свързани с този сървър. Защо не свържете някои?
Използвайте команда {{command}}, за да свържете клан.
common.clan_limit:
Максималният брой кланове е достигнат. Моля, обмислете възможността да ни подкрепите в нашия [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk), за да добавите повече от два клана.

Вече сте абониран? Използвайте командата {{command}}.
common.patreon_only:
Тази команда е достъпна само на абонирани сървъри на Patreon. Моля, помислете дали да ни подкрепите в нашия [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk), за да използвате тази команда.

Вече сте абониран? Използвайте командата {{command}}.
common.clan_verification:
Трябва да се уверим, че сте лидер или ко-лидер на този клан. Моля, потвърдете своя акаунт с API токена.
Използвайте командата {{command}}, за да потвърдите своя акаунт. API токенът е наличен в настройките на играта.
common.no_option: Нещо се обърка при изпълнението на тази команда. (не е намерена опция)
common.no_data: Към момента няма налични данни. Все още ги събираме!
common.no_clan_data: Няма налични данни за {{clan}}. Все още ги събираме!
common.fetch_failed: Нещо се обърка при извличането на данни от API.

component.expired: Този компонент вече не е активен. Изпълнете командата отново.
component.unauthorized: Трябва да изпълните командата, за да взаимодействате с компонентите.

common.no_clan_tag_first_time: Трябва да предоставите клан таг, за да изпълните тази команда!
common.no_clan_tag:
Трябва да предоставите клан таг, за да изпълните тази команда!
Като алтернатива можете да свържете клан по подразбиране към вашия профил с помощта на командата {{command}}.
common.no_player_tag:
Трябва да предоставите акаунт таг, за да изпълните тази команда!,
Като алтернатива можете да свържете някои акаунти към вашия профил с помощта на командата {{command}}.
common.clan_not_linked:
Няма клан, свързан с {{user}}.
Използвайте {{command}}, за да свържете клан.
common.player_not_linked: Няма акаунт, свързан с {{user}}. Използвайте командата {{command}}, за да свържете акаунт.
common.guild_unauthorized: Този сървър не е оторизиран за {{clan}}. Използвайте командата {{command}}, за да свържете клан.

status_code.400: Възникна неизвестна грешка при обработката на заявката (400)
status_code.403: Възникна неизвестна грешка при обработката на заявката (403)
status_code.404: Не бяха намерени съвпадения за посочения етикет.
status_code.429: Възникна неизвестна грешка при обработката на заявката (429)
status_code.500: Възникна неизвестна грешка при обработката на заявката (обикновено се случва по време на нулирането на сезона в играта)
status_code.503: Услугата временно не е достъпна поради прекъсване на поддръжката на играта.
status_code.504: Възникна неизвестна грешка при обработката на заявката (504)

common.something_went_wrong: Нещо се обърка при изпълнението на тази команда. Не е намерена опция.
common.missing_access: На бота липсва {{permission}} в {{channel}}, за да изпълни тази команда.
common.missing_manager_role: Липсва ви разрешението **Управление на сървъра** или ролята [Bot Manager](<https://docs.clashperk.com/others/bot-manager>), за да извършите това действие.
common.no_match_found: Не бяха намерени съвпадения с етикета {{tag}}

season.description: Сезонът, за който трябва да се показват нападения.

enable_auto_updating.description: Активиране на автоматично актуализиране (на всеки 30-60 минути)

stats.description: Показва статистика за ранковете и трофеите на легендите.

lastseen.description: Последно видяно време и дейности на членовете на клана.

alias.description: Create, delete or view clan aliases.

create.description: Creates a clan alias (short code or abbreviation) or clan nickname.

create.no_hash: A clan alias must not start with a hash.
create.no_whitespace: A clan alias must not contain whitespace.
create.no_clan: You must specify a clan tag to execute this command.
create.exists: An alias with the name {{name}} already exists.
create.clan_not_linked: The clan must be linked to the server to create an alias.

name.description: Tag of a clan or name of an alias

delete.no_name: You must provide a clan tag or clan alias to execute this command.
delete.no_result: No matches were found with the tag or alias {{name}}.

manager_role.description: Role that can manage the bot.

roster_manager_role.description: Role that can manage the roster members.

flags_manager_role.description: Role that can manage the flags.

links_manager_role.description: Role that can manage the Discord links.

webhook_limit.description: The maximum number of webhooks that can be created in a channel.

config.no_text_channel: You must specify a text channel to enable this event log.

cwl.still_searching: Your clan {{clan}} is still searching for the opponent.
cwl.not_in_season: Your clan {{clan}} is not in the CWL season.

attacks.description: Shows an overview of attacks for different CWL rounds.

lineup.description: Shows CWL lineup for a round (sorted by town hall and heroes).

members.description: Shows a list of all CWL participants.

history.description: Shows CWL history of a player or user.

roster.description: CWL roster and town hall distribution.

round.description: CWL summary for the current round.

stars.description: Shows CWL member ranking by stars.

stats.description: Shows an overview of all CWL rounds and group standings.

import_members.description: Whether to import members from the clan

sort_by.description: Sorting order of the roster member list

start_time.description: Roster start time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm, in 24 hours format)

end_time.description: Roster end time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm, in 24 hours format)

timezone.description: Search timezone by city or country (e.g. London, Singapore, India, Sydney)

allow_group_selection.description: Whether to allow members to select group

allow_multi_signup.description: Whether to allow multiple roster signups

use_clan_alias.description: Whether to use clan alias in the roster (created by /alias command)

color_code.description: Hex color code of the roster embed

post.description: Post a roster to signup or view members

clone.description: Clone a roster to create a new one

delete_role.description: Whether to delete the roster role

clan.description: Select a clan to add players from

target_group.description: Group of the user to move to

target_roster.description: Roster of the user to move to

selectable.description: Whether to allow members to select this group

group.description: Select a group to ping (overwrites ping_option)

members.description: Export a comprehensive version of clan member stats.

season.description: Export comprehensive seasonal stats of clan members.

flag.description: Create, delete or search player flags.

tag.description: The tag of a player to delete.

player.description: Show all flags against a player

export.description: Export all player flags to Excel.

tag.description: The tag of a player to search.

link.description: Create, delete or list player links.

create.description: Links a player account/clan to a Discord account.

user.description: User account to link to the tag.

is_default.description: Whether to set this as the default account.

clan_tag.description: The default clan tag to link.

create.no_bots: Bot accounts are not allowed to be linked.
create.fail: This player or clan tag is not valid.
create.prompt: What would you like to link? A Player or a Clan?

delete.description: Deletes a player account/clan from a Discord account.
delete.success: Successfully deleted the link with the tag {{tag}}.
delete.no_access: This player should be in your clan and you must be a "Verified" Co/Leader to perform this action. Use {{command}} to verify your account.

list.description: List all player links of a clan.

verify.description: Verify and link a player account using an API token.

timezone.description: Set your timezone offset for /activity command.

location.description: Search timezone by city or country. (e.g. London, New York, Singapore, India, Sydney)

timezone.set: Please set your timezone with the `/timezone` command. It enables you to view the graphs in your timezone.
timezone.no_result: Make your search more specific and try again.

profile.description: Shows linked accounts and clan of a user.

account_preference_for_naming.description: Whether to use the default account or the best account in the family.

reminders.description: Setup reminders for clan wars, capital raids.

reminder_id.description: Reminder ID (use /reminders list to get the ID)

create.description: Create reminders for clan wars, capital raids or clan games.

exclude_participants.description: Whether to exclude participant list and only include the message (clan wars only)

create.invalid_duration_format: The duration must be in a valid format. e.g. 2h, 2.5h, 30m
create.duration_limit: The duration must be greater than 15 minutes and less than 48 hours.
create.duration_order: Duration must be a multiple of 15 minutes. e.g. 15m, 30m, 45m, 1h, 1.25h, 1.5h, 1.75h
create.too_many_clans:
The clan selection menu is not available for more than 25 clans. {{clans}} clans were selected automatically!
To create a reminder for specific clans, pass clan tags or aliases through the 'clans' option while executing the command.

edit.description: Edit a reminder by ID (do /reminders list to get the ID)

delete.description: Delete a reminder by ID (do /reminders list to get the ID)
delete.not_found: No reminder was found with the ID {{id}}.
delete.success: Successfully deleted the reminder with the ID {{id}}.
delete.too_many_reminders: If you have too many reminders, please provide a reminder ID.

list.description: List all war reminders for clan wars, capital raids or clan games.

compact_list.description: Show a compact list of the reminders and disable ephemeral.

reminder_id.description: List a reminder by ID (do /reminders list to get the ID)

now.description: Create an instant reminder to notify members.
now.no_match: There are no wars or no members that are matching with the selected options.

by_player_tag.description: Get clan by a player tag.

defense_target.description: The base target # of your opponent.

members.description: Get a clan member list with heroes, trophies, war preferences and much more.

remaining.description: Shows remaining or missed war hits of a clan.

user.description: Remaining attacks of a linked user.

rushed.description: Rushed units and rushed % of a player or clan members.

clan.description: Displays rushed units of a clan.

stats.description: Shows attack and defense stats of clan members.
stats.no_stats: No stats are available for this filter or clan.

type.description: War Type [e.g. Regular, CWL, Friendly] (Default: Regular and CWL)

attempt.description: Fresh attacks or clean-up attacks. (Default: Both)

days.description: Number of days to include (last x days of wars)

wars.description: Number of last wars to include.

filter_farm_hits.description: Filter out farm hits (1 star and < 50% destruction)

clan_only.description: Only include the specified clan's war attacks.

attacks.description: Shows attack success rates of clan members.

defense.description: Shows defense failure rates of clan members.

units.description: Shows home village and builder base units of a player (with max/min levels)

upgrades.description: Remaining upgrades of a player with upgrading cost.

war.description: Shows war summary and overview of a clan.
war.no_war_id: No war was found for the specified war ID.
war.not_in_war: Clan is not in a war.

warlog.description: Shows the last 10 clan war logs.

setup.description: Enable/disable features on the server or add/remove clans.

enable.description: Enable a feature on the server or add a clan.
enable.description_long: Enable a feature on the server (War Feed, Last Seen, Clan Games, Legend Log, Capital Log, Clan Feed, Join/Leave Log, Clan Embed, Donation Log) or add a clan or link a clan to a channel.

channel.description: Channel to send updates to (defaults to the current channel)

color.description: Hex color code (only for donation log, clan games, last seen and clan embed)

role.description: Role for the flag notification (only for clan feed)

category.description: Category of the clan. (select from the menu or type your own)

enable.no_leader_link: Clan Leader must be linked to the bot to enable this feature.

channel_link.description: Link a channel to a clan.

disable.description: Disable a feature on the server or remove a clan.
disable.channel_not_found: No clans were found that are linked to {{channel}}.
disable.clan_not_linked: No clans were found on the server for the specified tag.

list.description: List all enabled features and clans.

utils.description: [DEPRECATED] Setup other utility features (link button, events schedular)

button_type.description: Select the button type to setup

embed_color.description: Hex color code for the embed

events.description: Setup automatic events for the server.

server_logs.description: Setup automatic logs for the server.

log_type.description: Select the log type to setup.

clan_logs.description: Setup automatic logs for the clan.

clan.description: Select the clan to setup logs.

action.description: What logs to enable or disable.

autorole.description: Enable automatic clan roles and Town Hall roles

autorole.no_system_roles: System managed or bot roles are not allowed.
autorole.no_higher_roles: Bot's highest role must be higher than the selected roles.
autorole.invalid_clan_tag: The specified clan tag is invalid.

Some roles have already been used for another clan. 
Please consider supporting us on [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to use the same roles for multiple clans.
autorole.clan_not_linked: The clan must be linked to the server to enable auto-role.

clan_roles.description: Manage automatic role management for clan roles.

common_role.description: Clan role for everyone in the clan.

only_verified.description: Roles will be given to the verified players only. (API token verification is required)

leagues.description: Manage automatic role management for leagues.

town_hall.description: Manage automatic role management for town hall levels.

allow_non_family_accounts.description: Whether to give roles to the members that are not in the family clans.

clan.description: The clan for which to set the war role.

eos_push.description: Set end of season push roles.

role.description: The end of season push role.

clans.description: The clans for which to set the end of season push role.

exclusive_family_role.description: Exclusive family role (all linked accounts are in the family)

account_linked_role.description: Account linked role (account linked but may not be verified)

list.description: List all auto roles and settings.

disable.description_long: Disable automatic role management for clan roles, town hall levels, or leagues.

clear.description: Clear all roles from all clans.

disable.success_with_count:
Auto-role has been disabled for {{count}} clan(s). 
{{clans}}

refresh.description_long: Refresh roles manually. (Use this command if the roles are not updated automatically)

user_or_role.description: Refresh an individual user or a role.

is_test_run.description: Test run to see the changes without applying.

force_refresh.description: Whether to bypass delays and force refresh roles.

role_removal_delays.description: Whether to delay the removal of roles.

role_addition_delays.description: Whether to delay the addition of roles.

always_force_refresh_roles.description: Whether to enforce role refresh for individual users by default.

allow_not_linked.description: Whether to allow not linked players to get roles.

verified_only_clan_roles.description: Whether to grant clans roles to verified players only.

summary.description: Shows summary of the clan family.

best.description: Shows a summary of best members.

wars.description: Shows a summary of current wars.

compo.description: Shows a summary of Town Hall composition.

cwl_ranks.description: Shows a summary of CWL ranks.

cwl_status.description: Shows a summary of CWL spin status.

leagues.description: Shows a summary of clan leagues.

attacks.description: Shows a summary of multiplayer attacks and defenses.

war_results.description: Shows a summary of seasonal war results.

missed_wars.description: Shows a summary of missed wars.

capital_contribution.description: Shows a summary of capital contributions.

week.description: The week to show capital contributions for.

activity.description: Shows a summary of clan activity (last seen).

clan_games.description: Shows a summary of clan games scores.

clans.description: Shows a summary of family clans.

help.description: Get a list of commands or info about a specific command.

invite.description: Get the bot invite and support server link.

redeem.description: Redeem or manage a Patreon subscription. (if you wish to support us)

disable.description: Disable subscription for a server (if subscribed)

whitelist.description: Whitelist a role or user to use specific commands.

list.description: List all whitelisted users and roles.

opt_out.description: Opt-out from the custom bot and delete related services.
